price: ወደ ሐዋርያትም «በኔና በመልክተኛዬ እመኑ» በማለት ባዘዝኩ ጊዜ (አስታውስ)፡፡ «አመንን፤ እኛ ሙስሊሞች መኾናችንን መስክር» አሉ፡፡
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡتُ إِلَى ٱلۡحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِي وَبِرَسُولِي قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَٱشۡهَدۡ بِأَنَّنَا مُسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh awḥaytu ilā al-ḥawāriyīna an āminū bī wabirasūlī qālū āmannā wa-ish'had bi-annanā mus'limūna
